CustomField.description: CLAIMSV2-62. This field will be populated by Conga. If the “Settlement Acceptance Received Date” is not populated, this field shall be blank as well, else populated with today's date
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the “Settlement Acceptance Received Date” is not populated, this field shall be blank as well, else populated with today's date
CustomField.label: Status Date : Coupon Document Generated
